titleInfo.title: Supplementary Material for "pya - a Python Library for Audio Processing and Auditory Display"

mods.abstract: This research data publication contains supplementary material that accompanies the publication "pya - a Python Library for Audio Processing and Auditory Display". As the pya code is public and available via http://github.com/interactive-sonification/pya, we here provide only specific audio files and code examples, specifically connected to Section 4 of the paper.
